Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.2 Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.2.1 Kusalapada » 2.2.1.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
5.
1251Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1252Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
6.
1253Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
